exceptions.exn: In environment d0, d1 : preDTA Href_ok_d0 : preDTA_ref_ok d0 Href_ok_d1 : preDTA_ref_ok d1 Unable to unify "preDTA_ref_ok d0" with "preDTA_ref_ok (u_merge d0 d1)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall d0 d1 : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d0 -> preDTA_ref_ok d1 -> preDTA_ref_ok (u_merge d0 d1)

Premises:
preDTA_ref_ok = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl b -> exists s0 : state, MapGet state d b = Some s0 : preDTA -> Prop
preDTA = Map state : Set
u_merge = fun p0 p1 : preDTA => MapMerge state (udta_conv_0 p0) (udta_conv_1 p1) : preDTA -> preDTA -> preDTA
insert_ostate_8 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 a : ad) (s0 s1 s0' s1' : state) (t : term), mpl_compat s0' s1' -> MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_0 a0) = Some s0' -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_1 a1) = Some s1' -> preDTA_ref_ok (u_merge d0 d1) -> a = new_preDTA_ad (u_merge d0 d1) -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t \/ reconnaissance d1 a1 t < -> reconnaissance (insert_ostate (u_merge d0 d1) a (Some (union_mpl s0' s1'))) a t
insert_ostate_2 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 a : ad) (s s0 s1 s0' s1' : state) (t : term), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_0 a0) = Some s0' -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_1 a1) = Some s1' -> preDTA_ref_ok (u_merge d0 d1) -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) a = None -> a <> uad_conv_1 a1 -> reconnaissance d1 a1 t < -> reconnaissance (insert_ostate (u_merge d0 d1) a (Some s)) (uad_conv_1 a1) t
insert_ostate_1 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 a : ad) (s s0 s1 s0' s1' : state) (t : term), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_0 a0) = Some s0' -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_1 a1) = Some s1' -> preDTA_ref_ok (u_merge d0 d1) -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) a = None -> a <> uad_conv_0 a0 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t < -> reconnaissance (insert_ostate (u_merge d0 d1) a (Some s)) (uad_conv_0 a0) t
insert_ostate_3 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 a : ad) (s s0 s1 s0' s1' : state) (t : term), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_0 a0) = Some s0' -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_1 a1) = Some s1' -> preDTA_ref_ok (u_merge d0 d1) -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) a = None -> a <> uad_conv_0 a0 -> reconnaissance (insert_ostate (u_merge d0 d1) a (Some s)) (uad_conv_0 a0) t < -> state_reconnait (insert_ostate (u_merge d0 d1) a (Some s)) s0' t
insert_ostate_4 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 a : ad) (s s0 s1 s0' s1' : state) (t : term), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_0 a0) = Some s0' -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_1 a1) = Some s1' -> preDTA_ref_ok (u_merge d0 d1) -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) a = None -> a <> uad_conv_1 a1 -> reconnaissance (insert_ostate (u_merge d0 d1) a (Some s)) (uad_conv_1 a1) t < -> state_reconnait (insert_ostate (u_merge d0 d1) a (Some s)) s1' t
insert_ostate_7 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 a : ad) (s0 s1 s0' s1' : state) (t : term), mpl_compat s0' s1' -> MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_0 a0) = Some s0' -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_1 a1) = Some s1' -> preDTA_ref_ok (u_merge d0 d1) -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) a = None -> a <> uad_conv_0 a0 -> a <> uad_conv_1 a1 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t \/ reconnaissance d1 a1 t < -> reconnaissance (insert_ostate (u_merge d0 d1) a (Some (union_mpl s0' s1'))) a t
preDTA_ref_ok_distinct_dest : forall d0 d1 d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok_distinct (M2 state d0 d1) d -> preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d0 d /\ preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d1 d
insert_ostate_6 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 a : ad) (s0 s1 s0' s1' : state) (t : term), mpl_compat s0' s1' -> MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_0 a0) = Some s0' -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_1 a1) = Some s1' -> preDTA_ref_ok (u_merge d0 d1) -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) a = None -> a <> uad_conv_0 a0 -> a <> uad_conv_1 a1 ->...-> reconnaissance (insert_ostate (u_merge d0 d1) a (Some (union_mpl s0' s1'))) a t
insert_ostate_5 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 a : ad) (s0 s1 s0' s1' : state) (t : term), mpl_compat s0' s1' -> MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_0 a0) = Some s0' -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_1 a1) = Some s1' -> preDTA_ref_ok (u_merge d0 d1) -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) a = None -> a <> uad_conv_0 a0 ->...-> state_reconnait (insert_ostate (u_merge d0 d1) a (Some (union_mpl s0' s1'))) s0' t \/ state_reconnait (insert_ostate (u_merge d0 d1) a (Some (union_mpl s0' s1'))) s1' t
predta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall s0 s1 : state, state_in_dta d0 s0 -> state_in_dta d1 s1 -> st_compatible s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
u_conv_0_ref_ok : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d -> preDTA_ref_ok (udta_conv_0 d)
u_conv_1_ref_ok : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d -> preDTA_ref_ok (udta_conv_1 d)
new_state_ins_r : forall (d0 : preDTA) (a0 : ad) (t0 : term) (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), reconnaissance d0 a0 t0 -> preDTA_ref_ok d -> d0 = MapPut state d a s -> MapGet state d a = None -> a <> a0 -> reconnaissance d a0 t0
predta_ref_ok_check_complete : forall d : preDTA, predta_ref_ok_check d = true -> preDTA_ref_ok d
predta_ref_ok_check_correct : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d -> predta_ref_ok_check d = true
preDTA_ref_ok_def : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d < -> (forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d)
new_state_insr_def_dta : forall (d0 : preDTA) (a0 : ad) (t0 : term), reconnaissance d0 a0 t0 -> Prop
new_state_insr_def_st : forall (d0 : preDTA) (s0 : state) (t0 : term), state_reconnait d0 s0 t0 -> Prop
new_state_insr_def_lst : forall (d0 : preDTA) (pl0 : prec_list) (tl0 : term_list), liste_reconnait d0 pl0 tl0 -> Prop
DTA_ref_ok = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p _ => preDTA_ref_ok p end : DTA -> Prop
insert_ostate_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state) (a0 : ad) (t : term), preDTA_ref_ok d -> MapGet state d a = None -> a <> a0 -> reconnaissance d a0 t < -> reconnaissance (insert_ostate d a (Some s)) a0 t
predta_ref_ok_check_correct_0 : forall d d' : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d d' -> predta_ref_ok_check_0 d d' = true
predta_ref_ok_check_complete_0 : forall d d' : preDTA, predta_ref_ok_check_0 d d' = true -> preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d d'
u_merge_1r : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (u_merge p0 p1) a = Some s -> forall b : ad, a = uad_conv_1 b -> MapGet state (udta_conv_1 p1) a = Some s
u_merge_0r : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (u_merge p0 p1) a = Some s -> forall b : ad, a = uad_conv_0 b -> MapGet state (udta_conv_0 p0) a = Some s
u_merge_2 : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p0 a t -> reconnaissance (u_merge p0 p1) (uad_conv_0 a) t
u_merge_5 : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance (u_merge p0 p1) (uad_conv_1 a) t -> reconnaissance p1 a t
u_merge_3 : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p1 a t -> reconnaissance (u_merge p0 p1) (uad_conv_1 a) t
u_merge_4 : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance (u_merge p0 p1) (uad_conv_0 a) t -> reconnaissance p0 a t
u_merge_0 : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_0 p0) a = Some s -> MapGet state (u_merge p0 p1) a = Some s
u_merge_1 : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_1 p1) a = Some s -> MapGet state (u_merge p0 p1) a = Some s
liste_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d prec_empty tnil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> P d la tl -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> P p p0 t
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
term_term_list_ind : forall (P : term -> Prop) (P0 : term_list -> Prop), (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P0 t -> P (app a t)) -> P0 tnil -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term_list, P0 t0 -> P0 (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term, P t
prec_list_ind : forall P : prec_list -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
positive_ind : forall P : positive -> Prop, (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~1)%positive) -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~0)%positive) -> P 1%positive -> forall p : positive, P p
MapPut1 : forall A : Type, ad -> A -> ad -> A -> positive -> Map A
term_list_ind : forall P : term_list -> Prop, P tnil -> (forall (t : term) (t0 : term_list), P t0 -> P (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term_list, P t
N_ind : forall P : N -> Prop, P 0%N -> (forall p : positive, P (N.pos p)) -> forall n : N, P n
eqm : forall A : Type, (ad -> option A) -> (ad -> option A) -> Prop

```  
intros d0 d1 Href_ok_d0 Href_ok_d1.
apply Href_ok_d0.
